testcase.name: Verify if Place is being successfully added using AddPlaceAPI
testcase.system-out: Given Add Place Payload "New Frontline house" "English-IN" "Panumbre Warun".passed When user calls "AddPlace" API with "POST" HTTP Request.....................passed Then the API call is success with status code 200...........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed And "scope" in response body is "APP".......................................passed And verify place_id is created which maps to "New Frontline house" using "GetPlace" API.passed

testcase.name: Verify if Delete Place functionality is working
testcase.system-out: Given DeletePlace payload...................................................passed When user calls "DeletePlace" API with "POST" HTTP Request..................passed Then the API call is success with status code 200...........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed
